--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq (rauq@t...)" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Pacifix ---
> 
> Pacifix is torn between not wanting the situation to dissolve into 
> fighting and the desire to save his friend and ally. Acting quickly, 
> he opens a broadband commlink with a somewhat short range, though 
> long enough for it's purpose, "Unknown bots! Identify yourselves. 
> What are doing with and where are you taking my friends?" He shouts 
> at Grimlock, having closed the comm, "Grimlock, hold your fire, till 
> I say you may shoot."


::REDHOT::

    "Heh-HEEEEYYYY" Redhot shouted as shots were fired in his general 
direction. He was NOT a warrior and was very leery of weapon fire. He 
preferred more peaceful interactions.
    "Redhot here" he commed to the nearest robotoid in the direction 
his 'friends' were being headed. "What is the meaning of this?" he 
demanded. 'The least you could do is ASK before you take!' With that 
he commed out. He hovered swiftly after the humanoids. "I hope you 
don't take off with humans that way!!" he managed to add as a quick 
retort.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
